languages.text:
Servo Skull has +25 Fellowship and Intelligence
Servo Skull stats are calculated at +30 for the purpose of {g|f:a8c7d8404d104d4dad2d460ec2b470ee}Insanity Signal{/g}, {g|f:33aa1b047d084a9b8faf534767a3a534}Priority Signal{/g}, or {g|f:62eeb81743734fc5b8fac71b34b14683}Vitality Signal{/g}

traits.locale_text:
Servo Skull has +25 Fellowship and Intelligence
Servo Skull stats are calculated at +30 for the purpose of {g|f:a8c7d8404d104d4dad2d460ec2b470ee}Insanity Signal{/g}, {g|f:33aa1b047d084a9b8faf534767a3a534}Priority Signal{/g}, or {g|f:62eeb81743734fc5b8fac71b34b14683}Vitality Signal{/g}

languages.text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
When calculating the effects of signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are considered to be increased by +30.
languages.original_text:
Рой сервочерепов получает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}.
При расчете эффектов сигналов его {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} увеличены на 30.

traits.locale_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +25 Fellowship and Intelligence.
When calculating the effects of signal abilities, the servo-skull swarm's characteristics are considered increased by +30.

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsü, +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Sinyal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerinin{/g} etkileri hesaplanırken hizmelet sürüsünün {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} +30 artmış olarak kabul edilir.

languages.text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
Al calcular los efectos de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de señal, las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} del enjambre de servocráneos se consideran aumentadas en +30.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
When calculating the effects of signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are considered to be increased by +30.

traits.locale_text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +25 de Empatía e Inteligencia.
Al calcular los efectos de sus capacidades de señal, las características del enjambre de servocráneos se consideran aumentadas en +30.

languages.text:
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高25点。
计算信号{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的效果时，伺服头骨集群的各项{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}视为提高30点。
languages.original_text:

When calculating the effects of signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are considered to be increased by +30.

traits.locale_text:
伺服头骨集群的社交、智力提高25点。
计算信号能力的效果时，伺服头骨集群的各项属性视为提高30点。

languages.text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}.
Bei der Berechnung der Effekte von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Signalfähigkeiten{/g} werden die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} des Servoschädel-Schwarms gewertet, als wären sie +30 höher.
languages.original_text:

When calculating the effects of signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are considered to be increased by +30.

traits.locale_text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +25 Gefolgschaft und Intelligenz.
Bei der Berechnung der Effekte von Signalfähigkeiten werden die Eigenschaften des Servoschädel-Schwarms gewertet, als wären sie +30 höher.

languages.text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +25.
Lors du calcul des effets des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de signal, les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de l'essaim de servocrânes sont considérées comme étant augmentées de +30.

When calculating the effects of signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are considered to be increased by +30.

traits.locale_text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de Sociabilité et d'Intelligence de +25.
Lors du calcul des effets des capacités de signal, les caractéristiques de l'essaim de servocrânes sont considérées comme étant augmentées de +30.

languages.text:
サーヴォスカルスウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}が+25される。
シグナル{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の効果を計算する際、サーヴォスカルスウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}は+30増加したものと見なされる。
